definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: She does not yet leave her dressing-room.
sentences.chinese: 她還在自己的化妝室裏呢。

sentences.english: This is my first time sewing in the make-up room.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次在化妝室裏，縫紉。

sentences.english: It had begun as an electrical fire in the Zebra Room, adjacent to the bride's dressing room.
sentences.chinese: 火災是從新娘化妝室旁“斑馬屋”的電火花開始的。

sentences.english: She darted into the women's dressing room .
sentences.chinese: 她急衝衝趕到女化妝室。

sentences.english: When the opera finished, the girls went back to their dressing-room.
sentences.chinese: 當歌劇演出結束的時候，姑娘們回到了她們的化妝室。

sentences.english: But in dressing rooms in department stores, you look in the mirror and you want to throw up.
sentences.chinese: 但是在百貨商店化妝室的鏡子一照，你就要嘔吐。

sentences.english: Yes , where's the dressing room, I'd like to try on this dress.
sentences.chinese: 是呀，化妝室在哪裏？我想試試這件衣服。

sentences.english: A half-dollar was passed over, and now a knock came at her dressing - room door.
sentences.chinese: 遞過去了半塊錢，然後就聽到有人敲她化妝室的門。

sentences.english: Excuse me. I would like to go to the rest room. Can you hold my child for me?
sentences.chinese: 對不起。我想要上化妝室。你可以替我看著小孩嗎？

definition: partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
see 領盒飯|领盒饭[ling3 he2 fan4]
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion

(TV or movie) blooper/continuity error/(theater) to flub one's lines/unintended exposure of a body part/to be exposed (of a scheme or trick)/to reveal sth one intended to conceal through a slip of the tongue/to blow one's cover
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5
